text: Guy Middleton (4 August 1900 - 30 October 1994) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1994 deaths Category:French male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Guy Middleton (swimmer)
